<noinclude>{{structure info}}</noinclude>
Jail cells are sometimes found in strongholds, up to 5 per stronghold can generate. They are composed of [[stone bricks]], [[iron door]], and [[iron bars]]. Iron doors of the cells are always generated facing towards the corridor.

|-
| Iron Bars
| 20
|-
| Iron Door
| 2
